text: varandaru kalisi kuda, drdhamaina kotalu gala nagaralalono, leda godala catu nundo tappa, mito yud'dham ceyajalaru. Vari madhya okari mida okariki unna dvesam, ento tivramainadi. Varu kalasi unnatlu nivu bhavistavu, kani vari hrdayalu cili poyi unnayi. Idi endukante, vastavaniki varu bud'dhihinulaina janulu
